import {Suspense} from "react" import {useCurrentUser} from "../hooks/use-current-user.hook" import {Link as A} from "react-router-dom" import { Flex, Box, Spacer, Link, Center, HStack, Heading, Button, Divider, Image, } from "@chakra-ui/react" import Logo from "../svg/logo-kv.svg" export function AuthCluster() { const [user, loggedIn, {signUp, logIn, logOut}] = useCurrentUser() return loggedIn ? ( Culture Exchange
{user.addr}
) : ( Culture Exchange ) } export default function WrappedAuthCluster() { return ( Loading...}> ) }
